documentTitle: Vente d'un véhicule d'occasion (Particulier à Particulier)
pageTitle: Vente d'un véhicule d'occasion - Particulier(s) à Particulier(s)
description: Vous visionnez les instructions pour un particulier (ou plusieurs particuliers) qui vend son véhicule à un autre particulier (ou plusieurs particuliers).

purchaserHasOriginalID.label: L'acheteur dispose-t-il d'une <ProofOfIdentity /> originale (les Mauriciens ont besoin de la <MNISIDCardLayoutLink>nouvelle carte d'identité</MNISIDCardLayoutLink>)?
purchaserHasOriginalID.label_other: Les acheteurs disposent-ils tous d'une <ProofOfIdentity /> originale (les Mauriciens ont besoin de la <MNISIDCardLayoutLink>nouvelle carte d'identité</MNISIDCardLayoutLink>)?

vendorAndPurchaserAreRelated.label: $t(form.vendorAndPurchaserAreRelated.label_{{numOfVendors}}_{{numOfPurchasers}})
vendorAndPurchaserAreRelated.label_singleVendor_singlePurchaser: Avez-vous un lien de parenté avec l'acheteur, par exemple père-fils vice-versa, mari-femme vice-versa, etc.?
vendorAndPurchaserAreRelated.label_singleVendor_multiplePurchasers: Avez-vous un lien de parenté avec l'un des acheteurs, par exemple père-fils vice-versa, mari-femme vice-versa, etc.?
vendorAndPurchaserAreRelated.label_multipleVendors_singlePurchaser: Y a-t-il un lien de parenté entre l'un des vendeurs et l'acheteur, par exemple père-fils et vice-versa, mari-femme et vice-versa, etc.?
vendorAndPurchaserAreRelated.label_multipleVendors_multiplePurchasers: Y a-t-il un lien de parenté entre l'un des vendeurs et l'un des acheteurs, par exemple père-fils et vice-versa, mari-femme et vice-versa, etc.?

vendorNameMatches.label: Votre nom affiché sur le <VehicleRegistrationBook /> correspond-il à celui qui figure sur votre <ProofOfIdentity>?
vendorNameMatches.label_other: Le nom de chaque vendeur affiché sur le <VehicleRegistrationBook /> correspond-il à celui qui figure sur leur <ProofOfIdentity /> correspondante?

preparation.title: Préparation

commonSteps.askPurchaserDeedOfSalePhotoOrPDF_singleP: <label>Demandez à l'acheteur une photo ou un <PDFAbbr /> de l'un des <DeedsOfSale /> pour vérifier que tous les détails sont corrects. Cette vérification est cruciale. En cas d'erreur, la <NLTAAbbr /> demandera que des modifications soient apportées aux <DeedsOfSale />, puis de revenir plus tard.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserDeedOfSalePhotoOrPDF_multipl: <label>Demandez aux acheteurs une photo ou un <PDFAbbr /> de l'un des <DeedsOfSale /> pour vérifier que tous les détails sont corrects. Cette vérification est cruciale. En cas d'erreur, la <NLTAAbbr /> demandera que des modifications soient apportées aux <DeedsOfSale />, puis de revenir plus tard.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserAuthorizationLetterPhotoOrPD: <label>Ask the purchaser for a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of the authorization letter to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is also important to avoid unnecessary back and forth.</label>

<label>Ask the purchasers for a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of the authorization letter to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is also important to avoid unnecessary back and forth.</label>
commonSteps.fillAndCheckDeedsOfSale: <label>You can use our <DeedOfSaleImportantLink>document generator</DeedOfSaleImportantLink> to generate the <DeedOfSale />. Alternatively, you can find a template of the <DeedOfSale /> on <GovtDeedOfSaleLink><NLTAAbbr />'s website</GovtDeedOfSaleLink>. Make sure that all 3 <DeedsOfSale /> are correctly filled, i.e. no typos. Do not sign any of the <DeedsOfSale /> yet.</label>
commonSteps.fillAndCheckAuthorizationLetter: <label>You can use our <AuthorizationLetterImportantLink>document generator</AuthorizationLetterImportantLink> to generate the authorization letter. Alternatively, you can find a template of the authorization letter on <GovtAuthorizationLetterLink><NLTAAbbr />'s website</GovtAuthorizationLetterLink>. Make sure that the authorization letter is correctly filled, i.e. no typos. Do not sign the authorization letter yet.</label>
commonSteps.sendProofOfIdentityPhotoToPurchaser_sing: <label>Send a photo of your <ProofOfIdentity /> to the purchaser.</label>
<label>Send a photo of your <ProofOfIdentity /> to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.sendProofOfIdentityPhotoToPurchaser_mult: <label>Send a photo of each vendor's <ProofOfIdentity /> to the purchaser.</label>
<label>Send a photo of each vendor's <ProofOfIdentity /> to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.sendVehicleRegistrationBookPhotoToPurcha: <label>Send a photo of the <VehicleRegistrationBook /> to the purchaser.</label>
<label>Send a photo of the <VehicleRegistrationBook /> to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.sendDeedOfSalePhotoOrPDFToPurchaser_sing: <label>Send a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of one of the <DeedsOfSale /> to the purchaser to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is crucial. In case there is any mistake, the <NLTAAbbr /> will ask for amendments to be made to the <DeedsOfSale />, then to come back later.</label>
commonSteps.sendDeedOfSalePhotoOrPDFToPurchaser_mult: <label>Send a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of one of the <DeedsOfSale /> to the purchasers to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is crucial. In case there is any mistake, the <NLTAAbbr /> will ask for amendments to be made to the <DeedsOfSale />, then to come back later.</label>
commonSteps.sendAuthorizationLetterPhotoOrPDFToPurch: <label>Send a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of the authorization letter to the purchaser to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is also important to avoid unnecessary back and forth.</label>

<label>Send a photo or <PDFAbbr /> of the authorization letter to the purchasers to verify that all the details are correct. This verification is also important to avoid unnecessary back and forth.</label>

preparation.step1: <label>How many vendors and purchasers are there? If there are multiple purchasers, the latter need to make sure to <NLTAPhone>call the <NLTAAbbr /></NLTAPhone> to check whether it is possible to have multiple purchasers in their case.</label>
preparation.step2_singlePurchaser: <label>Decide with the purchaser about who will prepare the <DeedsOfSale /> and/or the authorization letter (to issue the <AdministrativeStatusCertificate />).</label>
preparation.step2_multiplePurchasers: <label>Decide with the purchasers about who will prepare the <DeedsOfSale /> and/or the authorization letter (to issue the <AdministrativeStatusCertificate />).</label>
preparation.step3_singlePurchaser: <label>Decide with the purchaser about who will go to the <NLTAAbbr /> to issue the <AdministrativeStatusCertificate />. It's advised (not compulsory) that both the purchaser and you go to the <NLTAAbbr /> to issue this document as it doesn't require an authorization letter, nobody has to trust any stranger with their <ProofOfIdentity /> and you can exchange <DeedsOfSale /> on the spot.</label>
preparation.step3_multiplePurchasers: <label>Decide with the purchasers about who will go to the <NLTAAbbr /> to issue the <AdministrativeStatusCertificate />. It's advised (not compulsory) that all purchasers and you go to the <NLTAAbbr /> to issue this document as it doesn't require an authorization letter, nobody has to trust any stranger with their <ProofOfIdentity /> and you can exchange <DeedsOfSale /> on the spot.</label>
preparation.lastStep_singlePurchaser: <label>Ask the purchaser how they will pay for the vehicle.</label>
preparation.lastStep_multiplePurchasers: <label>Ask the purchasers how they will pay for the vehicle.</label>

payment.title: Accept payment for the vehicle's sale
payment.description_singleVendor_singlePurchaser: The purchaser and you need to agree on a location to meet up so they can pay you and sign the documents.
payment.description_singleVendor_multiplePurchas: The purchasers and you need to agree on a location to meet up so they can pay you and sign the documents.
payment.description_multipleVendors_singlePurcha: The purchaser and vendors need to agree on a location to meet up so payment can be effected and documents signed.
payment.description_multipleVendors_multiplePurc: The purchasers and vendors need to agree on a location to meet up so payment can be effected and documents signed.

commonSteps.askPurchaserProofOfIdentity_singlePurcha: <label>Ask the purchaser to make sure to bring their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserProofOfIdentity_multiplePurc: <label>Ask the purchasers to each make sure to bring their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserDeedsOfSale_singlePurchaser: <label>Ask the purchaser to make sure to bring the 3 filled <DeedsOfSale />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserDeedsOfSale_multiplePurchase: <label>Ask the purchasers to make sure to bring the 3 filled <DeedsOfSale />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserAuthorizationLetter_singlePu: <label>Ask the purchaser to make sure to bring the filled authorization letter.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserAuthorizationLetter_multiple: <label>Ask the purchasers to make sure to bring the filled authorization letter.</label>
commonSteps.bringProofOfIdentity_multipleVendors: <label>Make sure that all vendors bring their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.bringAuthorizationLetter: <label>Make sure to bring the filled authorization letter.</label>
commonSteps.bringFitnessCopy: <label>Make sure to bring the vehicle's original fitness vignette copy (required for the next fitness test).</label>
commonSteps.verifyDeedsOfSale: <label>To avoid any unnecessary hassle later, verify all details on the <DeedsOfSale /> again as you have most documents in hand.</label>
commonSteps.verifyDeedsOfSaleAndAuthorizationLetter: <label>To avoid any unnecessary hassle later, verify all details on the <DeedsOfSale /> and authorization letter again as you have most documents in hand.</label>
commonSteps.purchaserKeepsProofOfIdentity_singlePurc: <label>The purchaser needs to keep their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.purchaserKeepsProofOfIdentity_multiplePu: <label>The purchasers need to keep their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.purchaserKeepsAuthorizationLetter_single: <label>The purchaser needs to keep the signed authorization letter.</label>
commonSteps.purchaserKeepsAuthorizationLetter_multip: <label>The purchasers need to keep the signed authorization letter.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserProofOfIdentity_multipleVen: <label>Hand each vendor's original <ProofOfIdentity /> to the purchaser.</label>
<label>Hand each vendor's original <ProofOfIdentity /> to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserFitnessCopy_singlePurchaser: <label>Hand the vehicle's original fitness vignette copy to the purchaser.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserFitnessCopy_multiplePurchas: <label>Hand the vehicle's original fitness vignette copy to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserAuthorizationLetter_singleP: <label>Hand the signed authorization letter to the purchaser.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserAuthorizationLetter_multipl: <label>Hand the signed authorization letter to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.signatureMatch: Make sure the signatures match the ones on the respective party's <ProofOfIdentity />.
commonSteps.fundsTransferredOrNot: The bank will then inform you whether the funds have been transferred to your account.
commonSteps.noWorriesAboutFraud: This way, you don't need to worry about making sure you've been handed the exact amount, or anything like fake notes or other types of fraud.
commonSteps.bankAsksDeedOfSale: The bank may ask you for a signed <DeedOfSale /> as proof of sale.
commonSteps.cashPaymentDeedSignature_singleVendor_si: <label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchaser and you can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale />. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>
commonSteps.cashPaymentDeedSignature_singleVendor_mu: <label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchasers and you can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale />. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>
commonSteps.cashPaymentDeedSignature_multipleVendors: <label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchaser and vendors can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale />. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>
<label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchasers and vendors can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale />. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>
commonSteps.cashPaymentDeedAndPurchaserLetterSignatu: <label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchaser and you can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale /> and the authorization letter. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>

<label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchasers and you can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale /> and the authorization letter. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>

<label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchaser and vendors can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale /> and the authorization letter. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>

<label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchasers and vendors can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale /> and the authorization letter. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>
commonSteps.cashPaymentDeedAndPurchaserDelegateLette: <label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchaser and you can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale />. Only you need to sign the authorization letter at this moment as the purchaser's delegate will need to sign it later. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>

<label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchasers and you can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale />. Only you need to sign the authorization letter at this moment as the purchasers' delegate will need to sign it later. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>

<label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchaser and vendors can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale />. Only vendors need to sign the authorization letter at this moment as the purchaser's delegate will need to sign it later. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>

<label>Once the funds have been received in the agreed bank account, the purchasers and vendors can sign the other 2 <DeedsOfSale />. Only vendors need to sign the authorization letter at this moment as the purchasers' delegate will need to sign it later. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch)</label>

payment.step1: <label>Make sure you've removed all personal belongings from the vehicle.</label>

paidInCash.cashDeposit_singleVendor_singlePurchaser: Ask the purchaser to meet you at the bank to deposit the money directly in the agreed bank account. $t(payment.commonSteps.noWorriesAboutFraud) $t(payment.commonSteps.bankAsksDeedOfSale) Both the purchaser and you need to sign it at the counter, not before that. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch) $t(payment.commonSteps.fundsTransferredOrNot)
paidInCash.cashDeposit_singleVendor_multiplePurchas: Ask the purchasers to meet you at the bank to deposit the money directly in the agreed bank account. $t(payment.commonSteps.noWorriesAboutFraud) $t(payment.commonSteps.bankAsksDeedOfSale) All purchasers and you need to sign it at the counter, not before that. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch) $t(payment.commonSteps.fundsTransferredOrNot)
paidInCash.cashDeposit_multipleVendors_singlePurcha: Ask the purchaser and the other vendors to meet you at the bank to deposit the money directly in the agreed bank account. $t(payment.commonSteps.noWorriesAboutFraud) $t(payment.commonSteps.bankAsksDeedOfSale) The purchaser and vendors need to sign it at the counter, not before that. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch) $t(payment.commonSteps.fundsTransferredOrNot)
paidInCash.cashDeposit_multipleVendors_multiplePurc: Ask the purchasers and the other vendors to meet you at the bank to deposit the money directly in the agreed bank account. $t(payment.commonSteps.noWorriesAboutFraud) $t(payment.commonSteps.bankAsksDeedOfSale) The purchasers and vendors need to sign it at the counter, not before that. $t(payment.commonSteps.signatureMatch) $t(payment.commonSteps.fundsTransferredOrNot)

payment.leaveWithVehicle_singlePurchaser: At this point, the purchaser can leave with the vehicle.
payment.leaveWithVehicle_multiplePurchasers: At this point, the purchasers can leave with the vehicle.

administrativeStatusCertificate.title: Issue a
administrativeStatusCertificate.description: The purpose of this document is to certify that the vehicle being sold is not legally tied to anything that prevents its sale, e.g. theft, loan, opposition of sale, etc. This document can be issued at 's headquarters or sub offices.

commonSteps.bringProofOfIdentity_multipleVendors_ven: <label>Make sure to bring each vendor's original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.bringPurchaserProofOfIdentity_singlePurc: <label>Make sure to bring the purchaser's original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.bringPurchaserProofOfIdentity_multiplePu: <label>Make sure to bring each purchaser's original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.bringRs50: <label>Make sure to bring Rs50 in cash.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserToBringProofOfIdentity_singl: <label>Ask the purchaser to make sure to bring their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserToBringProofOfIdentity_multi: <label>Ask the purchasers to each make sure to bring their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserToBring1DeedOfSale_singlePur: <label>Ask the purchaser to make sure to bring their signed <DeedOfSale />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserToBring1DeedOfSale_multipleP: <label>Ask the purchasers to make sure to bring their signed <DeedOfSale />.</label>
commonSteps.askPurchaserToBringDeedOfSaleToMeeting_s: Before meeting with the purchaser, ask them to make sure to bring their signed .
commonSteps.askPurchaserToBringDeedOfSaleToMeeting_m: Before meeting with the purchasers, ask them to make sure to bring their signed .
commonSteps.givePurchaser2StampedDeedsOfSale_singleP: <label>Make sure to hand the 2 stamped <DeedsOfSale /> to the purchaser.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaser2StampedDeedsOfSale_multipl: <label>Make sure to hand the 2 stamped <DeedsOfSale /> to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserTheirProofOfIdentity_single: <label>Make sure to hand the purchaser their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserTheirProofOfIdentity_multip: <label>Make sure to hand each purchaser their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserVehicleRegistrationBook_sin: <label>Make sure to hand the original <VehicleRegistrationBook /> to the purchaser.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserVehicleRegistrationBook_mul: <label>Make sure to hand the original <VehicleRegistrationBook /> to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.givePurchaserAdministrativeStatusCertifi: <label>Make sure to hand the <AdministrativeStatusCertificate /> to the purchaser.</label>
<label>Make sure to hand the <AdministrativeStatusCertificate /> to the purchasers.</label>
commonSteps.giveDelegate2DeedsOfSale: <label>Make sure to hand 2 signed <DeedsOfSale /> to the delegate.</label>
commonSteps.giveDelegatePurchaserProofOfIdentity_sin: <label>Make sure to hand the purchaser's original <ProofOfIdentity /> to the delegate.</label>
commonSteps.giveDelegatePurchaserProofOfIdentity_mul: <label>Make sure to hand each purchaser's original <ProofOfIdentity /> to the delegate.</label>
commonSteps.giveDelegateProofOfIdentity_singleVendor: <label>Make sure to hand your original <ProofOfIdentity /> to the delegate.</label>
commonSteps.giveDelegateProofOfIdentity_multipleVend: <label>Make sure to hand each vendor's original <ProofOfIdentity /> to the delegate.</label>
commonSteps.giveDelegateVehicleRegistrationBook: <label>Make sure to hand the <VehicleRegistrationBook /> to the delegate.</label>
commonSteps.giveDelegateRs50: <label>Make sure to hand Rs50 to the delegate.</label>
commonSteps.giveDelegatePowerOfAttorney: <label>Make sure to hand original registered <PowerOfAttorney /> to your delegate.</label>
commonSteps.giveDelegatePowerOfAttorneyCopy: <label>Make sure to hand a photocopy of the <PowerOfAttorney /> to your delegate.</label>
commonSteps.delegateBringsProofOfIdentity: <label>The delegate will need to bring their original <ProofOfIdentity />.</label>
commonSteps.keepVendorProofOfIdentity_singleVendor_v: <label>Keep the registered proof of identity issued by an attorney or the original deed of sale at the time you purchased the vehicle.</label>
commonSteps.keepVendorProofOfIdentity_multipleVendor: <label>Keep each vendor's original <ProofOfIdentity /> or registered proof of identity issued by an attorney and/or the original deed of sale at the time you purchased the vehicle.</label>
<label>Keep each vendor's original <ProofOfIdentity /> so you can hand them back later.</label>
commonSteps.takeProofOfIdentityBack_singleVendor_sin: Make sure you have your original back from the purchaser.
commonSteps.takeProofOfIdentityBack_singleVendor_mul: Make sure you have your original back from the purchasers.
commonSteps.takeProofOfIdentityBack_multipleVendors_: Make sure you have each vendor's original back from the purchaser.
Make sure you have each vendor's original back from the purchasers.

commonItems.proofOfIdentity_singleVendor_vendorNameP: • The registered proof of identity issued by an attorney or the original deed of sale at the time you purchased the vehicle.
commonItems.proofOfIdentity_multipleVendors_vendorNa: • Each vendor's original or registered proof of identity issued by an attorney and/or the original deed of sale at the time you purchased the vehicle..

issuedByVendorDelegate.description: You will need to have a made, along with a photocopy of it, to legally allow your delegate to issue the on your behalf. Before your delegate goes to the ensure the following:

conditionalInstructions2.description: The officer will hand you the following:

issuedByVendorDelegate.description1: After the is issued, make sure that your delegate hands you the following:

informInsurance: N'oubliez pas d'informer votre compagnie d'assurance de la vente de votre véhicule afin qu'elle puisse résilier son contrat d'assurance.
endingNote_singlePurchaser: À ce stade, vous avez accompli toutes les formalités requises. L'acheteur devra procéder à I'enregistrement, à l'assurance et au transfert de propriété.
endingNote_multiplePurchasers: À ce stade, vous avez accompli toutes les formalités requises. Les acheteurs devront procéder à I'enregistrement, à I'assurance et au transfert de propriété.
